style_guide.pacing: Varied; sometimes quick and urgent (e.g., 'RUN. DON'T WALK'), other times reflective and personal

punctuation.emojis: Frequent use of emojis like 🙌, 🫶🏻, 🥰, 💐, ✨, 🪄, 🙈, 🏃‍♀️💨 to add emphasis and emotion
punctuation.exclamation: Frequent use of exclamation marks to convey excitement and enthusiasm.
punctuation.questions: Uses questions to engage the audience and prompt interaction (e.g., 'What’s your guess??', 'Is this YOU??', 'Do you believe in manifestation?')

style_guide.structure: Mix of short, punchy sentences and longer, more descriptive paragraphs. Often uses lists or bullet points to highlight key features or benefits.
common_phrases: Your product deserves to be seen ⭐️
hooks: Why didn’t I think of this sooner 🙈
These are going viral for a reason...
Give your mum a place to write her story before it’s just memories 🥰
calls_to_action: Let me know in the comments 👇

Why didn’t I think of this sooner 🙈

These two tripods are my go-to, one in particular. 

These were my first two ‘portable’ tripods I bought for filming UGC content so I thought, let’s create a comparison video to fellow UGC creators decide on which tripod is best for them 🙌

The question was now… how do I film this?! 

I need to hold both in the shot, right? 😵‍💫

Well in comes Mr 6… to save the day or did he really save the day 🤭

…it just was. not. working 😂

Then 

💡💡💡

I remembered I had my big study tripod I also bought for UGC creation. 

(shared in yesterday’s reel- so if you didn’t see it go check it out!).

This one saved the day 🙌

See… I knew 3 tripods would come in handy 😂

But shhhhh 🤐 I’ve actually got 5 but the other two are table top ones. 

That’s a story for another day 😏

Have you had your kids help you out with some of your UGC filming before? If so, how did it go?

#ugccreator #ugccommunity #ugcaustralia #ugcmarketing #contentcreatoraustralia #microinfluencer #socialmediamarketing
#ugcmum #workingmum #ugcfamily #ugcsuccess #australiancontentcreator #ugc #bloopers

What they were used for ⬇️

Behind the scenes of my kitchen filming my latest UGC collab.

Something I’ve learned is that UGC food collabs are messy, they take long, and you need multiple tripods for angles so you DON’T need to readjust as often.

= saving time 🙌

Tripod 1 ➡️ my smallest iPod used to hold my spare camera to shoot ‘behind the scenes’ of what I’m actually doing.

Tripod 2 ➡️ the trusty big one that’s firm and gives me good light on an overcast day 🤌 Plus I attached a mirror to it so I can see what I’m filming on the backer camera. 

Tripod 3 ➡️ my most used daily tripod to filming the actual cooking and down angles shots.

I don’t need to constantly be moving them around the room, wasting time adjusting and setting up back in place. 

This is what my set up quite often looks like in the kitchen. 

But guys 🫣 I still have 2 more hahaha 🤓

I’d love to know how many tripods you own, let me know in the comments 🫶🏻

#ugccreator #ugccommunity #ugcaustralia #ugcmarketing #contentcreatoraustralia #microinfluencer #socialmediamarketing
#ugcmum #workingmum #ugcfamily #ugcsuccess #australiancontentcreator

How I landed these collabs ⬇️

UGC- stands for user generated content. 

🎥 This is when a creator creates content for brands to use on THEIR social media platform or website. 

This content can also be used for sponsored ads to help the brand generate sales 🙌

UGC style content is quickly becoming the most popular way for brands to connect with audiences because it creates a more authentic connection with customers, which builds positive relationships & trust. 

Trust = sales 💸 

As a UGC creator, when you consistently post on social media, it becomes a platform where brands can find you and send you inbound offers. 

This right here 👆 is how I land brand collabs along with responding to brands in community groups. 

✨ My two kids are OBSESSED with the UGC product deliveries because they love using the boxes to build forts in our living room!

Win win, am I right? 😂

Hi! 👋 I’m Krystle, a UGC content creator. 

If you’re a brand looking to create authentic & engaging content that converts, let’s chat. I would love to work with you!

👇👇👇

📲 Send me a DM @ugcwithkrystle or email me, I’d love to hear from you! 

📩 krystlevugc@gmail.com

Vulnerable post 🫣

I know this sounds extreme and I’ve been told that I work hard but not to work THIS hard. 

This wasn’t my plan but I had an incredible inbound the week before my surgery. 

A stunning jewellery brand wanted me to create a UGC video for a Mother’s Day campaign. They thought I had a ‘natural’ look perfect for what they were looking for. 

The necklaces symbolise both my children’s birthstones, Emerald and Peridot (May & August). 

Now you’re probably thinking that’s no biggie, and I agree with you.

👇👇👇

But my surgery was to remove my fallopian tubes due to endometriosis completely destroying them. 

This means I’m extremely lucky to have had both my beautiful babies when I did because now, endometriosis has robbed me of having any more. 

It’s not something often talked about 🤷‍♀️

So the necklaces I filmed UGC content for were special to me because they symbolise both my babies 🥰

The UGC video was okay to film, I was standing or sitting and knew my limits, that I could do it. 

And the UGC video for the jewellery brand turned out BEAUTIFUL 😍 

Endometriosis may have beat me, but in the end I beat it because I have two beautiful boys by my side. 

That’s what these necklaces symbolise 🫶🏻

#ugccreator #ugccommunity #ugcaustralia #ugcmarketing #contentcreatoraustralia #socialmediamarketing #ugcmum #workingmum #ugcfamily #ugcsuccess #australiancontentcreator

What I don’t do ⬇️

This might surprise you but I know a lot of UGC creators don’t do this 🙈

👇👇👇

If a brand doesn’t have a prepared brief for a video concept, no problem! I’ve got great skills to write one for your UGC video. 

But the one thing I never do is start filming without having a comprehensive script written. 

This way the brand can see the vision for the video in my head and when I film the concept video, it is what was on paper 🙌

I hate to admit this…

I sat thinking about UGC for 12 months before I dove into it.

UGC = user generated content and it’s exactly
what brands want from creators!

Once I started to create content for brands and received their feedback on how much they loved it, it fueled a fire I didn’t know was in me 🔥

If only I started working with brands sooners!

We’re here now and that’s all that matters 🙌

The 30+ brands I’ve worked with have left me feeling so full and happy 🥰

l look forward to working with you as a future brand 🫶🏻

YOUR REMINDER ⬇️

You never know what’s around the corner with UGC. 

It’s a roller coaster ride and you know it 🎢

One moment you’re up feeling the excitement of landing your lastest collab, then the next you’re down, not knowing what’s next and when. 

Little do you know that a few hours can change EVERYTHING for you. 

Be patient. 

Give it time. 

Always hold your head high with what you’ve achieved because it’s one step closer to where you’re going. 

To all the girlies out there rocking UGC, you’ve got this!! I see you 🫶🏻

#ugccreator #ugccommunity #ugcaustralia #contentcreatoraustralia #ugcmum #workingmum #ugcfamily #ugcsuccess #australiancontentcreator

Is this YOU?? ⬇️

This might surprise you 👀 

UGC- user generated content involves making content for brands. To make content for brand you need their product. 

I’ve had packages show up at my door every day last week 🛍️ 🙏

…and some were HUGE!

It accumulates and becomes a lot. My recycling bin is currently full 😂

Something I don’t do as a UGC creator is accept collaborations that don’t align with me, or is a product I wouldn’t use or don’t need. 

You might think I’m crazy for saying this but I’ve turned down collaborations this week because of that. 

I’ve currently got a stock pile of products in my hallway I need to find places for 🤭

That’s where you’ll find me today 🏃‍♀️ 

👉 How do you manage the excess of products as a UGC creator? Let me know in the comments!
.
.
.

This machine is MAGIC 🪄 

The Ninja Creami Deluxe @ninjakitchenau turns anything into ice cream and I mean ANYTHING. 

I’ve tried at least a dozen combinations of ingredients and flavours and this is my own recipe, which is my favourite 😋 

🥭 2 x mangoes
🥥 1 cup coconut water
💪 1 scoop vanilla protein powder

THAT. IS. IT 

And it’s the most luxurious smooth high protein ice cream gelato ever!!

Friends have bought one after seeing my stories and have said “Krystle, omg it’s THE BEST THING!!”

I know 🤭

Do yourself a favour and get one, you won’t regret it. 

Let me know in the comments what flavour you want to see from me next! 💭

What you don’t see ⬇️

Before filming UGC videos there’s a planning process. 

I created a document where I record down what product I’m filming along with hooks, text on screen, visuals, voiceovers, I’m talking everything. 

It makes filming run smooth and takes the guess work out of what I need to do on the day ✨ 

As a mum of 2 kids under 6, I don’t have time to waste. 

I don’t like to admit this but I have far too many props and filming tools 🙈

When I decided to go all in with UGC I GO ALL IN 🙌 

For example, I have 3 tripods standing next to my bed right now from today’s filming, and yes I used them all for different things… and I have more but let’s not get into that 🤫

🤍🤍🤍

Hi! My name is Krystle and I work with brands to bring your idea come to life through engaging UGC content. 

What is UGC content?

👇👇👇

UGC = User Generated Content is contend generated from a user rather than the brand. 

This can include:

✨Photos
✨Videos 
✨Reviews

(But there’s a lot more to it 😉)

UGC content increases your brands 

🤍 AUTHENTICITY 
🤍 TRUST
🤍 RELATABILITY

WWYD? Here’s what happened ⬇️

It was overcast today and perfect weather to film some content at my front door. 

😳😳😳

Until I locked eyes with the worker in the truck who gave me a wave 🫣

Slowly sinking into the ground at this point…

I couldn’t postpone content filming so I went to get a glass of water and was going to film it after no matter what. 

My lucky stars were above me because when I came back he was gone 😅 

People walked past, no big deal… just didn’t want the guy who waved at me watching 🫠

At the end of the day it doesn’t matter what other people think. UGC creators get paid to make videos for brands. 

Starting is a leap. You just gotta keep leaping 🙌

Has this happened to you? Let me know in the comments👇👇👇
.
.
.
